document.full_text: chris bosh, lebron james and dwyane wade scored a combined 83 points to give the heat a 3-1 lead over the celtics in the east conference semifinals.
document.title: playoffs: conference semifinals | heat 98, celtics 90 (ot): this time, heat stars live up to name
lines_and_colors: chris bosh, lebron james and dwyane wade scored a combined 83 points to give the heat a 3-1 lead over the celtics in the east conference semifinals.
